posts.postText:
Is it just me, or do they copy  EVERYTHING  I do here.
Now they have a server donation policy, SERVER HOSTING, Board of Directors, Same Templates, TTT stuff, ect.

REALLY?!?!?

>>>>>>::::::::::CCCCCCCCCCCCCCCCCCCCCCC
i only get them when needed, if I got them for that, it would just be dumb.
Seriously? I think St3alth is just being butthurt now, trying to outdo us in every way they can.

>> Seriously? I think St3alth is just being butthurt now, trying to outdo us in every way they can. 

He left because he was butthurt.
He never got over himself I guess, it was no big loss anyway. He really didn't know jack about gmod. He never even heard of the "status" command when he started with us. >.>

When he was coding for me he got 3 lines of code down in a week. 2 of them didn't do anything.

He then claims he did a shitload for me.
